story_teamplasma_01_12000/2401_1001_0200:
We came because we were told a wounded
Pokémon was brought here!
story_teamplasma_01_12000/2401_1001_0300:
Ah, I see. You were worried about it and came
to check.
story_teamplasma_01_12000/2401_1001_0400: It was covered in wounds, but no need to worry.
story_teamplasma_01_12000/2401_1001_0500: It’s in the back getting treatment and recovering.
story_teamplasma_01_12000/2401_1001_0700:
By the way, that Pokémon that was brought
here—what was it?
story_teamplasma_01_12000/2401_1001_0800:
Well... It looked like a bug Pokémon, but I’ve
never seen anything like it.
story_teamplasma_01_12000/2401_1001_0900:
It’s covered in metal, and it has a cannon on
its back...
story_teamplasma_01_12000/2401_1001_1000: Aha! I think I know what it is!
story_teamplasma_01_12000/2401_1001_1100:
Its name is Genesect! It’s a Pokémon that’s been
modified by Team Plasma!
story_teamplasma_01_12000/2401_1001_1200:
Which means there’s a good chance it escaped
from the Team Plasma hideout!
story_teamplasma_01_12000/2401_1001_1400:
Please help us catch it! As soon as we
finished treatment—
story_teamplasma_01_12000/2401_1001_1600: Hmm... Are you looking for something?
story_teamplasma_01_12000/2401_1001_1900: It looks like it wants to tell him something.
story_teamplasma_01_12000/2401_1001_2200:
The treatment is over, but you should stay still
for a—
story_teamplasma_01_12000/2401_1001_2400: That Genesect might be able to guide us to N!
story_teamplasma_01_12000/2401_1001_2600:
N can communicate with Pokémon, and he might
have told Genesect about us!
story_teamplasma_01_12000/2401_1001_2700: Wait, so N was taken by Team Plasma after all?!
story_teamplasma_01_12000/2401_1001_2800: Yeah... That’s what I’m getting from Genesect.
story_teamplasma_01_12000/2401_1001_2900: If that’s the case, I’ll leave it with you for now.
story_teamplasma_01_12000/2401_1001_3000: But please don’t push it too much.
story_teamplasma_01_12000/2401_1001_3200:
OK! Let’s go, Genesect! Take it slow if you
need to!
story_teamplasma_01_12000/2401_1001_3300:
The connection between humans and Pokémon is
truly fascinating!
